values.value: SELECT toLabel(Subject), Who.Name, What.Name, ActivityDate, toLabel(Status), toLabel(Priority), Owner.NameOrAlias, LastModifiedDate, LastModifiedBy.Alias, Id, CreatedDate, SystemModstamp, Who.Id, WhoId, What.Id, WhatId, Owner.Id, OwnerId, LastModifiedBy.Id, LastModifiedById FROM Task USING SCOPE mine WHERE IsClosed = false AND IsRecurrence = false AND ActivityDate < TODAY ORDER BY ActivityDate ASC NULLS FIRST, Id ASC NULLS FIRST
